title: Add Server and User Avatar Uploads
description: Add ability for servers to have uploaded avatars and for users to have uploaded avatars. All users in chat should see other users' avatars.

title: Add Different Themes
description: Add different prebuilt themes with stretch goal of allowing user to theme elements as they please. Add theme switching support.

title: Set up CI/CD deployment to home server
description: Set up GitHub Actions to deploy Drocsid to home server so friends can test. Need to build backend + frontend and deploy to local infrastructure.
